title: Cloud Stocks: Which SaaS Players Will Win In PaaS
text: At the end of 2020, I wrote Big Idea 2021: SaaS Companies Will Create 10 Million Jobs with the central thesis that SaaS players would evolve into PaaS to create deeper moats around their core market positions and gain access to the related force multiplier. My assumption is that the trend would follow an 80:20 rule, with 20% of the SaaS companies becoming high performing PaaS players with robust developer ecosystems.
